title: "The Bounties Network" DApp couldn't be opened from Android 6.0.0
body: ### Description [comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug) *Type*: Bug *Summary*: blank screen is shown at attempt to open "The Bounties Network" from Andorid 6.0.0 regardless of network. Couldn't be reproduced on Android 6.0.1 and later. #### Expected behavior "The Bounties Network" can be opened #### Actual behavior Blank screen ### Reproduction [comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.) - Open Status - Tap on + - Select "The Bounties Network" from list ### Additional Information [comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.) * Status version: release 0.9.25(6315) * Operating System: Android (checked on Samsung Galaxy s6, Google Nexus 5 - Genymotion emulators) #### Logs [comment]: # (if on Android please replicate bug whilst running adb logcat) ``` 08-06 09:26:20.425 581 954 I ActivityManager: START u0 {act=android.intent.action.MAIN cat=[android.intent.category.LAUNCHER] flg=0x10200000 cmp=im.status.ethereum/.MainActivity (has extras)} from uid 10008 on display 0 08-06 09:26:20.483 238 644 D AudioFlinger: mixer(0xf1d80000) throttle end: throttle time(11) 08-06 09:26:20.493 1574 1574 V RNBootstrap: Available system memory 1636839424, maximum usable application memory 256M 08-06 09:26:20.553 238 644 D AudioFlinger: mixer(0xf1d80000) throttle end: throttle time(11) 08-06 09:26:20.671 1574 1574 D ReactNative: ReactInstanceManager.attachRootViewToInstance() 08-06 09:26:20.674 1574 1636 I ReactNativeJS: Running application "StatusIm" with appParams: {"rootTag":11}. __DEV__ === false, development-level warning are OFF, performance optimizations are ON 08-06 09:26:20.952 1574 1637 W unknown:ReactNative: StatusBarModule: Ignored status bar change, current activity is null. 08-06 09:26:20.952 1574 1637 W unknown:ReactNative: StatusBarModule: Ignored status bar change, current activity is null. 08-06 09:26:20.952 1574 1637 W unknown:ReactNative: StatusBarModule: Ignored status bar change, current activity is null. 08-06 09:26:21.185 1574 1574 D StatusModule: Signal event: {"type":"module.initialized"} 08-06 09:26:21.198 1574 1636 I ReactNativeJS: INFO [status-im.transport.inbox:118] - Android 6.0; Google Nexus 5 - 6.0.0 - API 23 - 1080x1920_1 Build/MRA58K; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/44.0.2403.119 Mobile Safari/537.36, Accept=image/webp,*/*;q=0.8} 08-06 09:26:45.627 1574 1692 D WebViewBridgeManager: method GET ```
can't repro on cloud real device Google Nexus 5 and Huawei P9 with Android 6.0 both. Can switch to Rinkeby and open DApp fine (just a bit waiting is needed ~1 min worse before it opens)

if logs are correct, this is due to usage of "fat arrow" operator (aka arrow function) on the line 10600.
maybe some of the webviews on some of the devices don't support that (since webviews currently are updated separately from the OS).

I would recommend for the dev team on their side to use [babel](https://babeljs.io) or something else to transpile it to a safe browser JS.
@rachelhamlin I think it should be closed because that is not an issue on our side and there is effectively nothing we can do to fix it.
